sense.gloss: holding a job, being employed, gainful employment
having great artistic talent, being a skilled performer
being well-versed in usages or practices of the court or military households

sdata.j: ↑学生↑↓がくせい↓アルバイトって、|↑有職|↑↓ゆうしょく↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓に↑分類↑↓ぶんるい↓されるのだろうか？
sdata.e: Student part-time workers? Are those classified as employed?
